question: Which of the following statements is not correct?
choices: A row matrix has only one row
A diagonal matrix has all diagonal elements equal to zero
A symmetric matrix A is a square matrix satisfying <katex>$A' = A$</katex>
A skew symmetric matrix has all diagonal elements equal to zero
explanation: A diagonal matrix is a square matrix where all non-diagonal elements are zero. The diagonal elements can be non-zero.
The statement saying diagonal elements must be equal to zero is incorrect (that would be a zero matrix if all are zero).
